00025 #include "OgreColourValue.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreBitwise.h"
00028 
00029 namespace Ogre {
00030 
00031     ColourValue ColourValue::Black = ColourValue(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00032     ColourValue ColourValue::White = ColourValue(1.0,1.0,1.0);
00033     ColourValue ColourValue::Red = ColourValue(1.0,0.0,0.0);
00034     ColourValue ColourValue::Green = ColourValue(0.0,1.0,0.0);
00035     ColourValue ColourValue::Blue = ColourValue(0.0,0.0,1.0);
00036 
00037     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     inline ColourValue::ColourValue(float red, float green, float blue, float alpha)
00039     {
00040         r = red;
00041         g = green;
00042         b = blue;
00043         a = alpha;
00044     }
00045     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00046     unsigned long ColourValue::getAsLongRGBA(void) const
00047     {
00048         unsigned char val8;
00049         unsigned long val32 = 0;
00050 
00051         // Convert to 32bit pattern
00052         // (RGBA = 8888)
00053 
00054         // Red
00055         val8 = (unsigned char)(r * 255);
00056         val32 = val8 << 24;
00057 
00058         // Green
00059         val8 = (unsigned char)(g * 255);
00060         val32 += val8 << 16;
00061 
00062         // Blue
00063         val8 = (unsigned char)(b * 255);
00064         val32 += val8 << 8;
00065 
00066         // Alpha
00067         val8 = (unsigned char)(a * 255);
00068         val32 += val8;
00069 
00070         return val32;
00071     }
00072     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00073     unsigned long ColourValue::getAsLongARGB(void) const
00074     {
00075         unsigned char val8;
00076         unsigned long val32 = 0;
00077 
00078         // Convert to 32bit pattern
00079         // (ARGB = 8888)
00080 
00081         // Alpha
00082         val8 = (unsigned char)(a * 255);
00083         val32 = val8 << 24;
00084 
00085         // Red
00086         val8 = (unsigned char)(r * 255);
00087         val32 += val8 << 16;
00088 
00089         // Green
00090         val8 = (unsigned char)(g * 255);
00091         val32 += val8 << 8;
00092 
00093         // Blue
00094         val8 = (unsigned char)(b * 255);
00095         val32 += val8;
00096 
00097 
00098         return val32;
00099     }
00100     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00101     ABGR ColourValue::getAsLongABGR(void) const
00102     {
00103         unsigned char val8;
00104         unsigned long val32 = 0;
00105 
00106         // Convert to 32bit pattern
00107         // (ABRG = 8888)
00108 
00109         // Alpha
00110         val8 = (unsigned char)(a * 255);
00111         val32 = val8 << 24;
00112 
00113         // Blue
00114         val8 = (unsigned char)(b * 255);
00115         val32 += val8 << 16;
00116 
00117         // Green
00118         val8 = (unsigned char)(g * 255);
00119         val32 += val8 << 8;
00120 
00121         // Red
00122         val8 = (unsigned char)(r * 255);
00123         val32 += val8;
00124 
00125 
00126         return val32;
00127     }
00128     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00129     bool ColourValue::operator==(const ColourValue& rhs) const
00130     {
00131         return (r == rhs.r &&
00132             g == rhs.g &&
00133             b == rhs.b &&
00134             a == rhs.a);
00135     }
00136     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00137     bool ColourValue::operator!=(const ColourValue& rhs) const
00138     {
00139         return !(*this == rhs);
00140     }
00141 
00142 }
